1559540.name: Timeless War
1559540.description:
Features


  • Adapt your strategy by building your army
  • Evolve your civilization over the ages
  • Guide the technological choices of your army
  • Manage your economy and defeat your opponents!

Create your own army composition

In Timeless War, you can create your own army.
By controlling the spawning of your units and their types, you can gain the upper hand over your enemy by making the right decisions at the right time.

Evolve through the ages

As you fight, your army evolves! You have the possibility to choose among different civilizations for each historical period, each offering a different and unique gameplay. It's up to you to make the right choices to defeat your opponent!


Play against your opponents online

Timeless War features an online multiplayer mode that allows you to face other players in civilization wars. Annihilate your opponent by making good tactical decisions.

The games that inspired us :

Age of War (Flash game that rocked our youth). We are fans of Auto Chess games (TFT, Underlords) and 4X strategy games like Civilization.
1559540.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 韩语, 日语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 土耳其语
